channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: @_pjfinn @beatgozon Are you allergic to color? J/k

item.description:
Informative, even-handed article about #Vero. I am trying to refresh my Vero password. I shall overcome.

See also: https://t.co/z1XWrMlvDu https://t.co/TeblBY6u7i

item.description:
@NassarMehmood @teamVRY I have an OG iPhone SE, a delight to hold. Recently had Apple replace battery, all in, about $70, a bargain!

A friend has iPhone 13 Mini, it's sweet but big. My dream: OG SE as large a display as fits, w/skinny bezels & a bit thicker for more battery capacity, + current camera.
item.source:markdown:
@NassarMehmood @teamVRY I have an OG iPhone SE, a delight to hold. Recently had Apple replace battery, all in, about $70, a bargain!
A friend has iPhone 13 Mini, it's sweet but big. My dream: OG SE as large a display as fits, w/skinny bezels & a bit thicker for more battery capacity, + current camera.

item.description: @_pjfinn Do you sometimes allow your iPhone to present a color image? (smile) Or is the desert so harsh that only b&w does it justice? Be aware, I shot thousands of b&w back in my film days. Mainly 35mm but some 120 and plenty of 4x5. Those were the days.
item.source:markdown: @_pjfinn Do you sometimes allow your iPhone to present a color image? (smile) Or is the desert so harsh that only b&w does it justice? Be aware, I shot thousands of b&w back in my film days. Mainly 35mm but some 120 and plenty of 4x5. Those were the days.

item.description:
Dear Tim Apple: I subscribe to Apple News+ and appreciate the quality content. I use two phones: the classic OG iPhone SE and a Google Pixel 6.

Why can't I read Apple News+ on my Android phone?
item.source:markdown:
Dear Tim Apple: I subscribe to Apple News+ and appreciate the quality content. I use two phones: the classic OG iPhone SE and a Google Pixel 6.
Why can't I read Apple News+ on my Android phone?

item.description: I stumbled across the menu item to display my Twitter analytics. If you understand this data (I am foggy...) a question: is there some way to learn which tweets triggered unusually high number of people to unfollow?
item.source:markdown: I stumbled across the menu item to display my Twitter analytics. If you understand this data (I am foggy...) a question: is there some way to learn which tweets triggered unusually high number of people to unfollow?

item.description: @teamVRY My Pixel 6 battery is meh. I thought Android 13 might improve the battery . Maybe I need to do a hard reset and add one app at a time? I wonder if the Island app may be one culprit? I use it to enable using two accounts with the Wyze camera app.
item.source:markdown: @teamVRY My Pixel 6 battery is meh. I thought Android 13 might improve the battery . Maybe I need to do a hard reset and add one app at a time? I wonder if the Island app may be one culprit? I use it to enable using two accounts with the Wyze camera app.

item.description:
I drew a smaller circle atop a larger circle with two short lines as feet. VERY abstract.

Text prompt: "owl in tree"

In less than a minute very attractive, artistic mages emerged.

Try it.

May you live in interesting times.

https://t.co/xUnrtZV1Ln

#AI-viz
item.source:markdown:
I drew a smaller circle atop a larger circle with two short lines as feet. VERY abstract.
Text prompt: "owl in tree"
In less than a minute very attractive, artistic mages emerged.
Try it.
May you live in interesting times.
https://t.co/xUnrtZV1Ln
#AI-viz

item.description:
Some nice work by a local photographer. I haven't met him, yet. Be sure and look at his portfolio of Oceano Dunes images. Stunning.

https://t.co/LXkkapac5Y

item.title: Experimenting with thread
item.description:
This is post two in thread experiment, entered as a comment

Post 3 entered using the "+" button. You have to hit the plus BEFORE posting the tweet.
item.source:markdown:
This is post two in thread experiment, entered as a comment
Post 3 entered using the "+" button. You have to hit the plus BEFORE posting the tweet.

item.description: @KevinCTofel thanks. Remember the early netbooks were smaller but with clam shell design. Yes, they failed, maybe because of LOUSY OS. There are billions of people and a gazillion computer outfits on earth. It seem like there MIGHT be a profitable niche for a small ChromeOS clam shell
item.source:markdown: @KevinCTofel thanks. Remember the early netbooks were smaller but with clam shell design. Yes, they failed, maybe because of LOUSY OS. There are billions of people and a gazillion computer outfits on earth. It seem like there MIGHT be a profitable niche for a small ChromeOS clam shell

item.description:
Have been using Lenovo C330 as a grab and go, couch computer. NOT my daily driver It's getting long in the tooth. Want to find a Chromebook that was a bit smaller. Are there any in the sub 11.5 size? Much prefer physical keyboard but MIGHT consider a tablet...

@KevinCTofel
item.source:markdown:
Have been using Lenovo C330 as a grab and go, couch computer. NOT my daily driver It's getting long in the tooth. Want to find a Chromebook that was a bit smaller. Are there any in the sub 11.5 size? Much prefer physical keyboard but MIGHT consider a tablet...
@KevinCTofel
